timeline.bodyText: Just wondering are you going to add more tests around this CustomWindow and CustomWindowFn below? It seems like if you only want to test proto-object round trip, there is no need to construct so much details.
timeline.author: boyuanzz

replies.bodyText: Yes. This is the one I want to use to test gradually and finally to make custom WindowFn work. Right now it is only private as it is used within this test. In the further as I find more place to add tests I can move this class out accordingly.
replies.author: amaliujia
